==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|おう|さか|yomi=k}}

===Etymology===
apusaka → aɸusaka → *awusaka → ausaka → ɔːsaka → oːsaka. Literally "meeting hill". Often used figuratively as a place of meeting or separation between men and women.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|[oːsaka]|lang=ja}}

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|おうさか|proper|hhira=あふさか}}

# the western area of [[w:Ōtsu, Shiga|Ōtsu]], [[w:Shiga Prefecture|Shiga]]
# an abbreviation for the ''Ōsaka Checkpoint'', a checkpoint located to the south of [[w:Ōtsu, Shiga|Ōtsu]], [[w:Shiga Prefecture|Shiga]] at Ōsaka Mountain
# an abbreviation for ''Ōsaka Mountain'', a 325 meter mountain located between [[w:Ōtsu, Shiga|Ōtsu City]] and [[w:Kyoto|Kyōto City]]
